title: Stadia Changelog: Rainbow Six Siege goes free this weekend, two new games debut with more coming
content:
Google had some impactful announcements regarding Stadia this week, but there was more going on. Two new games arrived on the platform, a couple of others were announced, and Rainbow Six Siege is hosting a free weekend on Stadia too.

moreâ€¦

The post Stadia Changelog: Rainbow Six Siege goes free this weekend, two new games debut with more coming appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: For a limited time, Google Stadia is offering up Ubisoft's Rainbow Six Siege for free, just in time for the "Demon Veil" update.
